from functools import wraps

def timing_decorator(func):
    @wraps(func)
    def wrapper(*args, **kwargs):
        import time
        start = time.time()
        result = func(*args, **kwargs)
        elapsed = time.time() - start
        print(f"{func.__name__} took {elapsed:.2f}s")
        return result
    return wrapper

@timing_decorator
def slow_function():
    import time
    time.sleep(2)
    return "Done"
